short_desc: Serves as the second largest county jail in Alameda County
description: Serves as the second largest jail in Alameda County.BAIL, BOOKING AND RELEASE INFORMATION: Charges, custody status, court dates, bail amounts, release dates and other inmate information can be obtained 24 hours daily at 925-551-6500. Inmate Locator also available online. Caller or user must provide inmate's name, Personal File Number (PFN), or correct date of birth before obtaining information. Bail can be posted in the Glenn D. Dyer Detention Facility lobby 24 hours daily.For information on mail procedures; money; property; telephone calls; vehicle impoundment; and visiting schedules, procedures, rules and regulations, call or visit website.
